before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fcab8","text":"Before collecting sequence data for your isolates, ensure that you can provide the minimum metadata recommended by your coordinating surveillance body. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n9iv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e9n6g","text":"PURPOSE: This protocol provides instructions for preparing and filling out the metadata templates necessary for direct submission to the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI). These instructions are relevant for the majority of whole genome sequencing data submissions derived from enteric bacterial pathogens collected for surveillance purposes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq2a8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mfr5","text":"SCOPE: This protocol provides detailed instructions for the following two metadata templates:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nqbs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"360ak","text":"1. BioSample metadata: guidelines for obtaining, populating, and validating the BioSample metadata template. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88a82","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40qhh","text":"2. SRA metadata: Guidelines for populating sequence-level metadata template. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akffl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v5u0","text":"Version history:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfem1","text":"v11: Change of guidance to use the One Health Enteric BioSample package for all submissions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6fj0","text":"v10: updates to the GenomeTrakr-extended pathogen biosample template (GT-pathogen package-OHE v0.3.xlsx) and release of newly available One Health Enteric package custom templates. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":70,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0g6d","text":"v9: Bug fix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efbul","text":"v8: Updated the picklists in the GenomeTrakr-extended pathogen package, \"GT-pathogen package-OHE v0.2.2.xlsx\".  Also provided a direct link to the newly published One Health Enteric package.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":72,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e7ir","text":"v7: Updated the picklists in the GenomeTrakr-extended pathogen package, \"GT-pathogen package-OHE v0.2.2.xlsx\" and added an incremental update file for the DRAFT One Health Enteric Package that includes extensive edits compared to v6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":72,"length":37},{"style":"bold","offset":155,"length":32},{"style":"bold","offset":232,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"487ka","text":"v6: Added the One Health Enteric package presented at IAFP 2021 meeting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"79nm7","text":"Please note that this protocol is public domain, which supersedes the CC-BY license default used by protocols.io.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Timme, R.E., Wolfgang, W.J., Balkey, M. et al. Optimizing open data to support one health: best practices to ensure interoperability of genomic data from bacterial pathogens. One Health Outlook 2, 20 (2020). https://doi.org/10.1186/s42522-020-00026-3
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6uvc2","text":"Gather the following contextual information for each pure culture isolate:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":74}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9vk71","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1pt5g","text":"organism name","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"737bf","text":"lab name that collected the sample","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b4vkf","text":"collection date","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cmclm","text":"collection source","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2fcl5","text":"Geographic location of sample collection","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f67cf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_protocols.title: NCBI submission protocol for microbial pathogen surveillance

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ql42","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db9i3","text":"This protocol provides instructions on acquiring and completing two distinct metadata templates essential for the submission of enteric bacterial pathogen surveillance data to the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":233}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"749j1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cb9p4","text":"Two metadata templates are required for each NCBI submission:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":61}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjt7o","text":"1. BioSample: metadata describing the isolate, sample collected, and submitting lab information.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqvb6","text":"2. SRA: metadata describing the sequence data collection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"splc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qf72","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2kqs1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":436,"id":447591,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"Screen Shot 2024-02-07 at 1.08.04 PM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdj9yen.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdh9yen.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdi9yen.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdg9yen.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dbic","text":"Templates for BioSample submission:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eeat2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebe8p","text":"Visit GenomeTrakr Metadata Validation System (GMVS) at https://gmvs.fda.gov/ to download custom, version-controlled, biosample metadata template(s). Current and previous versions of these templates can also be at the OHE GitHub page.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":217,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":21},{"key":1,"offset":217,"length":15}],"data":{}},{"key":"f78lf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20rv9","text":"Our custom templates include extensive guidance and controlled vocabularies for most attributes in the package. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95afa","text":"Sub-packages are available for download covering the major One Health samples types (human/animal hosts, food, food facilities, and farm/environment).  Users can choose to populate the full package, or one more more of the sub-packages.  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cf4qb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7u90","text":"When visiting GMVS, click on the ONE HEALTH ENTERIC icon within the NCBI Metadata Validation box.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97mej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq6g7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4po3s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es90q","text":"Follow GMVS instructions to download BioSample metadata template (click on the cloud download icon). Chose the most appropriate template for your sample types (the full package or one of the sub-packages). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckf7q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtfmc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"71gsl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B0546785977111ED96680A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://gmvs.fda.gov"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"ADD3859CA7EC11ED80950A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/CFSAN-Biostatistics/One_Health_Enteric_Package"}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":250,"id":447595,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"Screen Shot 2024-01-12 at 12.23.24 PM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdp9zje.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdm9zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdn9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdk9zje.webp","width":451}},"3":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":528,"id":447599,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"9avc8\",\"text\":\"One Health Enteric Metadata Sheet Upload\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"Screen Shot 2024-01-11 at 3.49.35 PM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdt9zje.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdr9zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxds9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxdq9zje.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cn1vi","text":"Upload the completed OHE metadata template to GMVS and click on -VALIDATE- icon. ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98t72","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eefr1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c61ls","text":"The GMVS validation system will check each entry and also run LexMapr for auto-assignment of the IFSAC category. {"blocks":[{"key":"1b66j","text":"Template for SRA metadata submission:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejtph","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ake2","text":"Download the generic \"Metadata spreadsheet with sample names\" file from the NCBI Submission Templates page:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":22,"length":38},{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":38}],"data":{}},{"key":"5jfnh","text":"https://submit.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/templates/","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":42}],"data":{}},{"key":"29q0e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ddfh","text":"And follow the guidance in the following table:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18lpp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3p4e","text":"PRO TIPS:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hpaa","text":"If you have sequences to submit that belong to more than one BioProject, create a separate submission + metadata table for each of your BioProjects. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f5eq","text":"Entering fastq filenames in the spreadsheet: On a Mac, you can directly copy the file names from the folder into a spreadsheet. This is not possible on a PC using copy and paste but can be done with some command-line operation. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35j6n","text":"Finally, it is important to develop a QA/QC step to make sure the files are associated with the correct sample name. For example, use a left function in excel to strip of the appended text in the file name and then use the exact match to make sure the name matches the sample name.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"DCFE1F103B1911ECA7920A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://ftp-trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/metadata_table/SRA_metadata.xlsx"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"C960E9B83B1911ECA7920A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://submit.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/templates"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c619f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aoqem","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"30ph0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ldcb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avu29","text":"Save the second sheet (SRA_data) as a TSV (tab-delimited file) for upload in the “SRA metadata” tab within the submission portal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5h12c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8od9m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h3nc","text":"*NCBI should also accept the original excel formatted file.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52d3s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":[],"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["145","260.81817626953125","147"],"data":[["Field","Description","Example"],["sample_name","Include the same ID here as you entered for "sample_name" in the BioSample submission template.","UT-12345"],["library_ID","The library name should be a unique ID relevant to your workflow. It can be an autogenerated ID from your LIMS system or a modification of your sample_name.","UT-12345.6"],["Title","Short, free text description that identifies the data on public pages.

For Example:
{methodology} of {organism}: {sample_name}","WGS of Salmonella enterica: UT-12345"],["library_strategy","Overall sequencing strategy or approach.

{"blocks":[{"key":"663da","text":"Review the excel -Instructions- sheet within the OHE excel file.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4l19p","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ebpe7","text":"Proceed to fill out the BioSample metadata template in the -UserEntry- excel sheet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6f7pk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5llpt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3r9qa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":218,"id":447619,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"4rhu6\",\"text\":\"Instructions Sheet within OHE excel file\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"Screen Shot 2024-01-11 at 3.54.13 PM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxef9zje.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxed9zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxee9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxec9zje.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":138,"id":447615,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"4ui0m\",\"text\":\"User Entry Sheet within the OHE excel file.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"Screen Shot 2024-01-11 at 3.56.46 PM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxeb9zje.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxd99zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxea9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxd89zje.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8b02","text":"Address validation errors:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6lbl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq7j8","text":"If there are validation errors, GMVS will generate a log report.  If few errors are reported, edit values by clicking the EDIT icon, otherwise, export reviewed template by clicking -EXPORT ERRORS-.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ck6b","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58cf3","text":"Make required changes and click -RE-IMPORT SHEET- and proceed to re-validate the template. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9sl5e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef784","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cu3kb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":208,"id":447623,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"Screen Shot 2024-01-11 at 5.11.01 PM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxej9zje.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxeh9zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxei9zje.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxeg9zje.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7jdlt","text":"LexMapr is a tool that processes free text from isolation_source and generates standard terminologies from controlled vocabulary/ontologies, including FoodOn, GenEpiO, UBERON, ENVO, NCBI Taxon, and specific food and environmental categories from\nInteragency Food Safety Analytics Collaboration (IFSAC) controlled vocabulary. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":48,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i67h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5iv9f","text":"LexMapr: https://github.com/Public-Health-Bioinformatics/LexMapr.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":55}],"data":{}},{"key":"72u99","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgtac","text":"Each GMVS record subject to validation is analyzed with LexMapr, the attribute isolation source gets an ontological descriptor and a category from IFSAC+ terminology for food safety.  After records are processed with LexMapr, a report is generated","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fc4fr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g6bb","text":"The LexMapr report generated at GMVS contains the following columns: strain, isolation_source, isolation_source (LexMapr generated), and IFSAC_category.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evg5u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fjmii","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8eae3","text":"Review the Lexmpr generated recommendations for isolation_source and IFSAC_category. If you agree with the recomendations, copy these the contents of these fields into the validated BioSample metadata template, under the isolation_source and IFSAC_category fields, respectively. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34t9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22jld","text":"If the IFSAC category(s) recommended for the sample type are incorrect or not appropriate, leave that entry blank for the submission and submit a bug report to genometrakr@fda.hhs.gov.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":74,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":160,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4ulq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1v36","text":"Save the validated biosample metadata template and proceed with NCBI submissions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"54A9D7A1CC1F11EE973C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/Public-Health-Bioinformatics/LexMapr"}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[114,172,200,200],"data":[["strain","isolation_source","isolation_source (Lexmapr generated)","IFSAC_category"],["FDA189213897_s001","ENV swab sponge","environmental swab sponge","environmental-factory/production facility"]],"guid":"2117B5EFD19F49B99D9B7BFC8B262945","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9mrac","text":"LexMapr Output generated during validation. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":[],"printData":[["strain","isolation_source","isolation_source (Lexmapr generated)","IFSAC_category"],["FDA189213897_s001","ENV swab sponge","environmental swab sponge","environmental-factory/production facility"]],"rowHeights":[],"url":"https://github.com/Public-Health-Bioinformatics/LexMapr"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9m8b","text":"No validation errors:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12q29","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bb910","text":"If metadata passes GMVS validation, each record will be displayed with all the metadata and you will have an option to export metadata.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7q8i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dm4i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3kb2p","text":"Click on the -EXPORT METADATA- icon.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50gle","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"210lq","text":"Review validated BioSample metadata and lexmapr output (cleaned up isolation_source entries and proposed IFSAC_category).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":121,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6kpbg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0740DFE5D27411EEB33C0A58A9FEAC02","height":250,"id":447627,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"Screen Shot 2024-01-11 at 4.23.46 PM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pwpi9zje.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxem9zje.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxek9zje.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"556EDA9132324EA1B465E1DB0538B7A9","step_guid":"BC0E22F377E2425AA10320D48A005A15","title":"for reviewing lexmapr output."}}}}
